sense.name: gain points in a game; add up (numbers)
sense.commentary:
Syntax includes: NP1[agent] TALLY (up) NP2
Includes: TALLY UP
NOTE: The numeric value of NP2 is usually implied as in Examples 1, 2 and 4: goal, votes, list of guests and not obviously stated as in Example 3: values.
sense.examples: Blake Gallagher tallied the only goal of the second period. I tallied the complete list of party guests. Tally up all the values in Column A. After the city tallies up the votes, the announcement is made.

sense.name: be compatible, similar or consistent
sense.commentary: Syntax is: NP1[theme{plural}] TALLY NP1[theme] TALLY with NP2[theme]
sense.examples: These two stories don't seem to tally. The fingerprints on the gun tally with those of the suspect. This OS does not tally with the newest World of Warcraft version.
